title: Implement widget load time instrumentation for all dashboard widgets
summary: Add comprehensive timing instrumentation to capture load performance metrics for every widget type in the SaaS dashboard system. Track initial render, data fetch, and full interactive readiness times.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Instrument all dashboard widgets to capture load/render/interaction times

title: Capture render and interactive readiness times per widget instance
summary: Implement granular timing collection for each widget instance, measuring both initial DOM render completion and full interactive state achievement. Include async data loading and user interaction availability timestamps.

title: Report timing data with user, device, and browser context metadata
summary: Enhance performance telemetry with comprehensive context including user segments, device capabilities, browser versions, and network conditions. Ensure data anonymization for GDPR compliance.

title: Build engineering dashboard with widget performance breakdowns
summary: Create dedicated engineering dashboard displaying widget-level performance metrics with breakdowns by type, user segment, and time periods. Include percentile distributions and trend analysis visualizations.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Create engineering dashboards with performance breakdowns

title: Create user segment and time window filtering for performance data
summary: Implement flexible filtering capabilities for performance analysis including user cohorts, time ranges, and geographic regions. Support custom segment creation and saved filter presets.

title: Implement outlier detection and regression flagging system
summary: Deploy statistical anomaly detection to identify performance outliers and regressions in widget load times. Use historical baselines and confidence intervals to minimize false positives.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: outlier detection, and root cause analysis

title: Enable drill-down to root cause analysis (CDN lag, third-party scripts)
summary: Build root cause analysis tooling to investigate performance issues, specifically tracking CDN response times, third-party script impacts, and API latencies. Provide actionable remediation suggestions.

title: Configure alerts for widgets breaching 2s load time at 95th percentile
summary: Set up automated alerting when widget load times exceed 2 seconds at the 95th percentile. Include severity levels, notification channels, and escalation paths for different breach durations.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: automated CI/CD-integrated alerting for SLA breaches (>2s load for 95th percentile)

title: Integrate performance monitoring with CI/CD deployment pipeline
summary: Connect performance monitoring system to CI/CD pipeline to enable pre-deployment performance validation and post-deployment monitoring. Include automated rollback triggers for performance regressions.

title: Block deployments causing performance regressions automatically
summary: Implement automated deployment gates that prevent releases when performance benchmarks detect regressions. Include override mechanisms with approval workflows for emergency deployments.

title: Monitor external service widget fallback performance metrics
summary: Implement comprehensive monitoring for external service widgets including fallback mechanism performance tracking. Track latency, error rates, and fallback activation frequency to ensure resilient dashboard performance when third-party services fail.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Monitor edge cases including external widget fallbacks

title: Implement user prompts for widget hiding when performance budget exceeded
summary: Create intelligent user experience features that prompt users to hide resource-intensive widgets when performance budgets are exceeded. Provide clear explanations and alternatives to maintain dashboard usability while preserving performance targets.

title: Anonymize all telemetry data for privacy compliance
summary: Implement comprehensive data anonymization for all performance telemetry to ensure GDPR compliance. Remove all personally identifiable information while maintaining statistical validity for performance analysis and trend detection.

title: Create user-facing performance data transparency interface with opt-out
summary: Build a transparent interface showing users what performance data is collected and how it's used. Provide clear opt-out mechanisms to respect user privacy preferences while maintaining compliance with data protection regulations.

title: Build self-service analytics portal for product owners
summary: Develop a comprehensive self-service analytics portal enabling product owners to independently access dashboard performance metrics. Include intuitive visualizations, custom report builders, and exportable insights without requiring engineering support.
